thread.title: Victor
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Victor

author: Victor
title: Victor
text: Discovered a mistake in my shipping details after my order was placed. Sent an email to correct before dispatch, and got a confirmation the day after that the address had been corrected. Worth mentioning is that I placed my order on a Sunday and the day after was a bank holiday in UK. Still my package was sent Tuesday morning to the correct address.
